Jasny\HttpMessage\Uri\Port::withPort

Return an instance with the specified port.

A null value provided for the port is equivalent to removing the port information.

    Signature

    public function withPort(null|int $port )

    Parameters

    $port — object
    The port to use with the new instance; a null value
    removes the port information.

    Returns

    Port
    A new instance with the specified port.

    Errors/Exceptions

    InvalidArgumentException
    for invalid ports.
